subject: Baseball
Frauds and Swindling
lead_paragraph: The Mets owners, on the heels of the Bernard L. Madoff Ponzi scheme, sold a share of the team to Steven A. Cohen, a hedge fund manager whose operation was in the cross hairs of federal prosecutors.
snippet: The Mets owners, on the heels of the Bernard L. Madoff Ponzi scheme, sold a share of the team to Steven A. Cohen, a hedge fund manager whose operation was in the cross hairs of federal prosecutors.
